Body: Robin has some packages of gum. There are 7 pieces in each package. Robin has 6 extra pieces of gum. In all the number of pieces of gums robin has is 41.
Question: How many packages does Robin have?

Question: How many more children are on the bus now than there were before the bus stop?

Question: How many bottle caps did danny have at first?
